content: quick and fun ribbed baby hat one size only but very stretchy fabric will fit a variety of baby head sizes our model freddie is 6 months old in these pictures yarn 1 skein of hedgehog fibres super bulky 82m/150g colourway pictured fool s gold needle 10mm / us 15 circular or double pointed needles the hat is worked in the round adjust needle size to obtain correct gauge gauge 13 stitches and 13 row = 4 /10cm in 1x1 rib pattern unstretched
